1: <pb/><t>Re' hin naa nuloq'em</t> <t>i QaJaaw Dios pan wánima.</t>
2: <t>Naa nuloq'em i QaJaaw Dios panuk'achariik.</t> <t>Naa nutz'uyem wach nik' pa' chik najtiil wilkiin ayu'.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Maayeew taq ak'ux chikinaah i ajaab'ees</t> <t>Ni xata chinaah chik jino'q i winaq ruum re' reh xama' inko'linik ta wo' hoq.</t>
4: <t>Eh noq inkimik kisutinik wo' chik chi pooq ak'al.</t> <t>Eh xa chupaam i q'iij re' re' insahchik wach aha' naq wilik taqe i rukapaaj rub'aan.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Atoob' reh awach i ruk'ul i rotob'il i QaJaaw re' ruDios i Jacob.</t> <t>Eh ruuk' wo' i RaJaaw i ruDios i ruyeew i ruk'ux.</t>
6: <t>Re' xyej-anik reh i taxaaj, i wach ak'al,</t> <t>i palaw, je' wo' chu'nchel i wilkeeb' chupaam taqe re'.</t> <t>Eh i rub'an taqe i ruq'or.</t>
7: <t>Re' rub'ehel i rub'an kuuk' i ti' wilkeeb'.</t> <t>Eh i ruyeew kiwa' taqe i nuhmeel. <pb/>Eh i resaj taqe panti' k'axik i je' pantz'ilom wilkeeb'.</t>
8: <t>Re' QaJaaw Dios i ruteh inaq'kiwach i moywach</t> <t>Eh i ruksaj taqe i q'ehb'eel,</t> <t>i ruk'ax taqe i korik wach kik'ux.</t>
9: <t>Re' QaJaaw Dios i ruko'leej taqe i tokoom tinamit,</t> <t>taqe i ma' xta kituut kajaaw, taqe ixoq kamnaq kib'ahiil.</t> <t>Eh i ruyoj wach inkiyejaa' wach i yiib' wach kina'ojb'al.</t>
10: <pb/><t>Re' taq i hat i aj Sión, re' taq aaWaJaaw aaDios naa ruwihiik chi taaq'anik,</t> <t>xa jar ch'iht pa' chi k'achareel naa kik'iik. <pb/>Neeta naq inye'arik ruloq'il.</t>
